description: This file contains the main entry point and core logic for a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe game using Ocean Professional theme style. It defines theme constants, application setup, game state management, and UI components including game board, cells, and gameplay interactions.

classes.name: OceanColors
classes.description: Defines a color palette with Ocean Professional theme colors used throughout the UI.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up Material 3 theme and home screen for the game.

classes.name: GameState
classes.description: Manages game logic, state of the board, current player, winner, and game reset.

classes.name: GameScreen
classes.description: Main UI widget for displaying game status, board, and restart option.

classes.name: _Board
classes.description: Widget rendering the 3x3 game's grid and handling cell interactions.

classes.name: _Cell
classes.description: Individual cell widget representing a game square, with tap responsiveness and visual effects.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point initializing and running the Tic Tac Toe app.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the ThemeData with Ocean Colors and custom styling.

methods.name: tapCell
methods.description: Handles user interaction when a cell is tapped; updates game state.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: _statusText
methods.description: Generates status message based on game state.

methods.name: _statusColor
methods.description: Determines UI color for the status message depending on the game outcome.
